XanMag?  Any word on when installment three is going to be available.  I have really been looking forward to it.   I have noticed that all of the other threads have been discontiinued due to non use.  As good as the first two were I find that hard to believe.
 
By the way your getting a little competition from Chris Stone  and his game Woo Goes Further.   Wow what a blast that was.  Well worth a look.

I will certainly take a look at Woo as the responses seem to be positive.

I am dabbling with it at the moment, but no major progress has been made.  Coaching two high school sports has taken more of a toll on my 'Quest' time than expected.  I look forward to firing it up again over my Thanksgiving break and making some good progress.  I will definitely keep you posted as progress develops.

Thanks for the inquiry!
